# 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy ‚Äî no markdown formatting)
A warm Christmas glow fills the room, the CRT screen hums softly, and snow falls gently outside the window. This cozy winter coding desk is designed for deep focus, studying, writing, programming, and holiday relaxation.
This 3-hour LoFi & Synthwave Christmas mix blends soft analog textures, gentle static, warm retro pads, and a calm festive atmosphere. Perfect for quiet evenings, focused work, or relaxing holiday nights.
Best for:
‚Ä¢ Coding and programming
‚Ä¢ Studying and deep focus
‚Ä¢ Cozy winter evenings
‚Ä¢ Writing or reading
‚Ä¢ Background ambience for work
Aesthetic:
Christmas tree lights ‚Ä¢ warm red desk lamp ‚Ä¢ snow falling outside ‚Ä¢ retro CRT with terminal text ‚Ä¢ 80s/90s synth gear ‚Ä¢ garland and soft holiday decorations ‚Ä¢ analog warmth
Drop a üéÑ in the comments if winter coding nights are your vibe.
# 4. VISUAL DESIGN (Image + Animation Instructions)
## Chosen Image Style ‚Äî Matched to Your Upload
Warm holiday-themed retro desk scene.
CRT monitor with glowing terminal text.
Christmas tree with lights behind the desk.
Snowfall outside a large window.
Garland & warm string lights.
Retro synths, tape decks, reel-to-reel machine, and indoor plants.
Warm red lamp creating contrast with cool snowy exterior.
## AI Prompt (Updated for Winter & No Neon City)
Ultra-cozy retro Christmas coding desk inspired by late-80s and early-90s technology. Cinematic, slightly angled composition for depth. A large CRT monitor centered on the desk displays clear monochrome terminal text (green or amber glow, sharp characters). Warm red desk lamp illuminating analog gear: reel-to-reel deck, cassette units, vintage synthesizers, retro keyboard.
Behind the desk, a large window shows a snowy winter evening scene: falling snow, frosted glass, soft streetlight bokeh, no neon city. A small decorated Christmas tree with glowing lights sits by the window. Garland and warm string lights hang above. Plants frame the desk naturally.
Lighting blends warm holiday tones with cool winter outdoor light. High detail but clean at thumbnail scale. Soft, inviting, cozy atmosphere. Vaporwave-lofi-synthwave aesthetic adapted to winter theme. Perfect for loop-ready animation.
## Animation Notes
- Gentle snowfall outside
‚Ä¢ Very soft CRT flicker every ~20‚Äì30 sec
‚Ä¢ Subtle lamp glow pulsing (low intensity)
‚Ä¢ Zero camera motion
‚Ä¢ No reflections or glass artifacts

### Phase 1 ‚Äî Warm Holiday Glow (BPM 50‚Äì60)
- [ ] soft ambient pads, warm analog hum, gentle static, faint winter air tone ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] retro vaporwave chords with soft festive warmth, no melody, subtle analog drift ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] CRT-inspired ambient texture, cozy indoor quiet, distant snowy silence ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
### Phase 2 ‚Äî Cozy Winter Flow (BPM 60‚Äì70)
- [ ] midtempo lofi beat, warm synth bass, soft percussion, stable focus rhythm ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] layered pads with holiday warmth (no sleigh bells), mellow drum groove, cozy interior ambience ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] soft retro arps, lightly brightened mood, comfortable momentum ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
### Phase 3 ‚Äî Snowfall Deep Focus (BPM 68‚Äì78)
- [ ] deeper analog chords with muted percussion, snowfall-inspired softness ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] mid-energy focus beat, warm pads, quiet emotional undertone ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] evolving ambient-synth focus track, steady warmth, no abrupt changes ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
### Phase 4 ‚Äî Soft Christmas Fade (BPM 50‚Äì60)
- [ ] slow vaporwave pad layers, warm holiday edge, deeply relaxed energy ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] ambient pads with gentle snowfall sound texture (very faint), minimal rhythm ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
- [ ] drifting final outro, warm analog fade, soft winter quiet ‚Äî winter lofi synthwave
